Friday , August 22 , 2014 - 07:40 p.m. MANILA -- Police have arrested eight suspected members of an online syndicate accused of blackmailing more than 1,000 Hong Kong and Singapore residents after luring them into exposing themselves in front of webcam , an official said Friday .

The raid on the syndicate 's locations in Bulacan on Thursday was a follow - up to an operation backed by Interpol in April in which 58 Filipinos were arrested , and another 100 linked to the extortion in a subsequent investigation in May .
